author: {'steamid': '76561198052489392', 'num_games_owned': 372, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1710494423}
review:
Многие cpут игру за то, что выглядит как мобилка или еще что. Я скажу так. Дефолт игра как она есть, она реально забагованное унылое гoвнo. И если просто её запустить, то можно тут же дропнуть и забыть про нее как страшный сон.
[h1] НО ПОДОЖДИТЕ! [/h1]
Для этой игры есть шикарный мод, называется Romero Mod. Я сам про него узнал лет 10 или сколько назад из видосов Шусса. Так вот, поставив этот мод, игра нереально преображается. Уходят баги. Нпц начинают нормально следовать за тобой и управляться. Менеджмент базы становится интересный. Да просто сама игра, лут и война с зомби становятся кайфовыми. Я в свое время дал этой игре шанс с Ромеро Модом после видосов шустрилы и ни капли не пожалел. Я в ней тогда провел десятки часов. И она того определенно стоит.

author: {'steamid': '76561198827709426', 'num_games_owned': 333, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 1046, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1709146805}
review:
I Actaully bought this on release many years ago. 
So broken , so janky, so fun.
I cannot recommend this at all.its fun, good story, decent base building, but zombies are just wayyyy to unbalanced, you have to take it, super steady, this game doesnt know what balance is.
I've always felt the State of Decay games were the spiritual successors to fort zombie.  or more its retarded brother.
The AI is atrocious, the game is honestly pretty ugly, reminds me of read dead revolver, literally early 2000's gen graphics it's crash and bug-happy,
This game actaully influenced 7 days to die, few of the devs are big zombie games fan said this and resident evil, minecraft infulenced the game

author: {'steamid': '76561198198018550', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1860, 'last_played': 1703548154}
review: Fell in love with this game the first time I saw it on Youtube many many years ago. Now that I have it and can play it? Its fantastic! Do not expect 2023 levels of quality and graphics. There is so much to love in this game. I have not found another game that does zombie defense like it or better than it. You will need to save often due to occasional to frequent crashes. Again, this game is amazing. I suggest you watch some gameplay on Youtube and decide if this game is for you! I hope they one day make a sequel

author: {'steamid': '76561198052796318', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1689869874}

author: {'steamid': '76561199049500326', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1672327065}
review: Игра хуе и игрой ее не назвать даже в 2009 году. Это скорей всего как многие написали в отзывах, это браузерная игра. Но да ее стоит брать если ты фармишь карточки потому что карточки дорогие а когда то стояли аж 200 р. Игру только можно взять для фарма карточек. Меня на 7 минут кое как хватило. А еще нужно получить карточку)) не уверен что смогу протянуть еще 10 минут в этой игре. 1. Что качается игры смысл игры набрать больше очков как в легендарной игре змейка. 2. Управления просто убогое я бы даже сказал его просто нет. 3 Но есть плюс, это хорошая музыка в главном меню. А вообще стоит взять ее получить карточки и сделать возврат. Карточки останутся а деньги вернете за игру вы даже будите в плюсе

review: it's a very nice timekiller and a good overall way to have some quick fun. I appreciate the effort put into the gameplay, especially the zombies. I was surprised to see a zombified doctor reviving his fellow undead by placing their limbs back on like LEGO mini figures. however, most of the environment lacks in visual quality, excluding Ben. speaking of which, the biggest flaw is probably the fact that you only have 1 character to choose from, sure you can customize their occupation and traits, but not how Riley looks or acts

author: {'steamid': '76561198043876397', 'num_games_owned': 339, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 759, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 714, 'last_played': 1675914278}
review:
This game hails from a golden age where factor was favored over form.

The best way to describe this game would be: Runescape but with guns and survival elements.
Combat hits based on dice-rolls depending upon character skill levels (finesse, blunt, rifle, etc).
You can build traps and fortifications to slow down incoming attacks on your base.
Clean inventory system, looting sucks but if it were easy, what fun would that be?
Outfit your guys with weapons that are available to you, they will not fire if they don't have ammo.

I don't know why this was never recommended to me, was literally right up my alley. 
Had to have a fever dream about this game before I remembered it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198217243284', 'num_games_owned': 61, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 686, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 459, 'last_played': 1645789894}
review: It's janky, It's buggy, It's messy, but is It fun? Hell Yeah! Don't try to look away from this game, this game has its own charm that no other games have. If you have been gaming on PC since 2000s, you may have heard about this game or have already watched the infamous let's play series from Revocane on YouTube. When I got my hands on playing for the first time, it's a bit clunky but in a good way and you can get use to it in only a few mins (if you have played other survival games with a RPG controls then you can play this one familiar). Judging by its visual is very dated, for a hidden gem from 2009, but you won't about it much. The story and the way its play is very simple, since it's a RPG, you're playing as Ben Riley who can be customize with different background, skills and traits, each of them provides you depend on how you play. Unlike some other RPGs, you can't get skill points in this game, instead the game will get them for you, as I said it's depend on how you play this game once you complete built Ben Riley. So don't get confuse when playing. Enjoy!

author: {'steamid': '76561198002766813', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 3276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3276, 'last_played': 1545627593}
review:
古典的なゾンビ映画の世界を楽しみたいなら、これしかないという一作です。のろのろ動く、間抜けなゾンビを相手にただひたすら生き残るゲームというのは実のところ少ないのですが、そういうのが好きな人にはたまらない一作です。ゾンビを倒すたびに弾が減り、仲間を助ければ食料が乏しくなり、心細さに耐えかねて、イチかバチか夜間に探索に出て食い殺される、と。
　プレイ時間が少ないのは、Steam版は買い直して２、３回やっただけだから。その何倍も遊んでいます。何年経っても、突然やりたくなる。そんなゲームです。

　ただ、仲間AIが半端なく障害物に引っかかったり、すこしでも構造物があると自分の照準がぐちゃぐちゃになるので戦える場所が制限されたりと、ダメなところはたくさんありまして、そういうのに耐えられない人は辛いかもしれません。自分は、「恐怖でパニックに陥った」という脳内補完で楽しんでおります！

author: {'steamid': '76561198124462633', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 470, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 227, 'last_played': 1678880935}
review:
I actually thought about this game today and decided to try and find it online again, I was pretty shocked to find it here on Steam. I loved this game when I was a kid, now being 24 years old the wave of nostalgia I felt was incredible. I would play this glitchy, goofy, fun game for hours and loved it. I still havn't found a zombie game that quiet matches this game. Games like Project Zomboid and Rebuild come close but this game will always have a special place in my heart. 

The game is old, buggy, and crusty looking but even after all this time it is still a blast to play. The mechanics of the game are pretty straight forward, pick a base and conduct "missions" by heading out into town to collect guns, supplies, and survivors to help prepare your base for a mega horde of zombies. Every time you conduct a mission the town is randomly generated so every mission will never quiet be the same. The controls are pretty simple as well, shooting takes a little bit of time to learn the hit boxes but becomes easy with practices. 

There are RPG elements in that you can tailor your characters skills however you like. Melee only? Sure, shotgun guy? Go for it. There is a nice selection of weapons you can pick from to change things up. You can also build traps and barricades in your base however you want to help with the incoming horde. 

My biggest complaint with the game would have to be the zombie types, some zombies carry weapons and can shoot or slash back at you. Not to mention medical zombies can piece together fallen zombies and bring them back to life which can be a real pain if you don't put them down first. However this does bring a bit of challenge to the game which is pretty fun. 

All in all I am very happy to see this old game again and am excited to be able to play this little gem as much as I want. If you have never played the game before or are like me and have played this a lot a long time ago the price is well worth it. There are also tons of old lets plays out there if you are still on the fence and want to see some game play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198132712883', 'num_games_owned': 275, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1594360402}
review:
Esse é aquele tipo de jogo ruim de doer, difícil pra caramba, mas que ao mesmo tempo tem conteúdo, desafio, mecânicas, é um bom passatempo. Eu diria que ele é o avô do State of Decay, tem mecânicas idênticas, foco em exploração, combate, sobrevivência, leves elementos rpg. Não é meu favorito pois existem jogos melhores desse gênero, mas se você tiver um hardware mais modesto, vale a pedida, é um jogo bem curioso e interessante.

Pros:
Exploração e Loot
É um jogo leve
Desafiador (pune o jogador pelos seus erros como gasto de munição, stamina e combate desnecessários).
Tipos diferentes de zumbis. (Existem zumbis médicos que revivem outros zumbis, isso é comédia demais kkkk)

Contras:
Câmera péssima (uma aberração que varia entre top down e terceira pessoa)
Comandos confusos (até agora não descobri como usar os itens do inventário)
Os zumbis as vezes deslizam como se andassem no gelo.
Tem alguns problemas de renderização em objetos a certa distância.

Nota final 6/10 (É um jogo mediano, até é ok)

author: {'steamid': '76561198009388231', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1655328959}
review:
Embrace the jank.

If you can do that, this is a gem.

Gunplay: intense(missing a shot on a nearby zombie is a butt clenching experience).
Survival: intense(an early game wound can last the WHOLE game, goes with gunplay).
Looting: fun(loads of goodies to find, and a keen eye is required to find them. Little is out in the open).

If you can stomach the janky nature of this game you can have fun with this one. Having zombies flop when climbing walls, zombies dropping from the ceiling or flat out phasing through walls.

Build your Ben Riley as you wish(you can only play as him but you customize his stats). Make new and exciting builds. Find loot piles and be surprised with awesome swag. Loot for medicine, food, guns, ammo, survivors and fuel. Build your base into a death fortress for the final wave of zombies. Watch your survivor companions run around like dogs trying to catch their own tails when all you need them to do is FOLLOW YOU DOWN A F***ING ALLEY and consider seeing what bullets taste like.

This game is oozing with charm. It's like a busted up pinto you got for your 16th birthday. It a c***bucket, but it is your c***bucket and you love it all the same.

If you can't stomach jank, not for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098342214', 'num_games_owned': 10629, 'num_reviews': 595, 'playtime_forever': 587, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 587, 'last_played': 1575963035}
review:
[h1]Fort Zombie é um jogo antigo de sobrevivência e exploração que se passa numa cidade infestada de zumbis[/h1]

Nesse jogo você assume o papel de Ben Riley, um sobrevivente da cidade e logo no começo você deve ir até o forte (que você escolheu no começo, seja Delegacia/Prisão/Escola) e lá que será onde você irá gerenciar sua base, mas o seu papel principal é basicamente ir em missões para resgatar sobreviventes e coletar recursos, como armas, munições, comidas, medicina e até itens diversos como gasolina para eletricidade (o que tanto nesse meu save como dos meus de varios anos atrás eu nunca consegui manter por mais de 2 dias as luzes acesas por falta desses tipos de recurso risos)

Então é um jogo bem divertido, você passa os dias nele fazendo as missões que não são tão desafiadoras mas o desafio também vai depender do horário que você for nelas (se chegar em uma missão a noite, irá enfrentar grupos de inimigos espalhados pelas ruas e perto das construções, o que torna mais difícil a coleta de recursos, mas o pior é tentar resgatar sobreviventes nesse horário, é bem mais complicado)

Bom agora falando mais sobre o jogo, primeiro eu creio que quem não jogou esse jogo no passado, com certeza não vai querer jogar agora, pois é um jogo antigo com uma gameplay um pouco complicada (naquela época onde tinha um monte de jogo com jogabilidade horrível, eu já achava esse complicado de jogar). 
Resumindo a gameplay, a camera é bem ruim, você gira usando o botão direito do mouse e ainda na questão da sobrevivência durante as missões o segredo é poupar energia de corrida (apertando a tecla CTRL trocando andando pra apressado, economizando sua stamina), enquanto evita os zumbis durante as missões.
As armas de fogo não são tão úteis nas missões, na verdade basta você upar "CLUB" na hora que você criar seu personagem, sendo que ele nasce com uma Crowbar (Barra de ferro), o que sugiro você ter colocado o club em pelo menos 50 pontos, evitando também não se atrapalhar tirando pontos de outras coisas no começo, isso vai fazer você ficar bastante OP e você nem vai querer usar mais nada além da barra de ferro (com exceção na missão final dependendo da sua estratégia pra lidar com a horda)

Agora falando sobre a vinda dele pro Steam, foi positiva mas tem seus problemas, resumindo um jogo que foi bastante requisitado pelos old schools que jogaram na época do lançamento, porém é um jogo antigo que rodava melhor em versões anteriores do Windows, portanto não crashava tanto, mas no caso eu creio que por não ser otimizado pro W10, é provável que você vá ter crashs, principalmente se mexer nas configurações de gráfico o que aconteceu bastante aqui.

[b]Concluindo, só compre esse jogo se você já tiver ouvido falar dele e tiver jogado no passado, pois pros que não sabem ele não tem uma gameplay inovadora, os controles podem ser ruins pra quem não tá acostumado e se o teu negocio for ficar explorando construções em lugares infestado de zumbis, hoje em dia já existem jogos que proporcionam isso e com uma gameplay muito superior, basicamente esse jogo está perfeito ainda mas apenas para quem se divertiu com essa belezinha no passado[/b]
10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198033938329', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1570506398}
review:
Good old game before 7 Days to Die. Got this game back in 2012 and lost it since, glad it's back!

A game where you choose a fort to take, build and survive the days until the end while you get supplies, survivors and ammunition. Some zombies are unique to others. Some carry guns, can charge and have slight different stats to one another. Adding a more strategic feel to how you should approach a horde as you can't just go in guns blazing. The game also runs on a sort of rpg character skills as the combat is very alike to Elder Scrolls 3 Morrowind's combat. However guns tend to hit 90% of the time atleast for me. Melee tends to suck at most for characters that are low skilled based on melee stats.

Also, never fight armed military zombies unless you are prepared.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015281529', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 682, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1657754353}
review:
Played this game in 2012 right after i left high school. i seen this game online by lets players and liked it buy it on amazon at the time and played it when i got my 1st computer i build myself as i played the hack out of this thing, only got 30fps at the lowest settings and when i got the gpu it was hit and go on the 60 fps but now i can play it at the max settings and at 60s. my steam say i only play the game for less then an hour, but the turth is i played it for hours on end even mothes at time.

sure the game is a buggy mess and all that but even with that you can't deny the fact its a well done game, if only they have more time and money on there hands to make the game less buggy it would be a great zombie game and more.

heres to hoping they do make updates and a patch to the game one day, but for me i say give it a buy. its only a few bucks!

author: {'steamid': '76561198174450227', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 940, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 268, 'last_played': 1676887154}
review:
バイオ４みたいなマス目のアイテム欄で武器やアイテムによって大きさが変わるので、アイテムを大量には持てないショットガンとかアサルトとかいろいろ持ってくと探索の時のアイテムが多いと入らないので、npcに持たせるかショットガンならショットガンだけみたいにしないときつい。npcも銃弾を消費するので、しっかり渡してあげましょう。この金額でこのクオリティーなら文句なしですよ、古いので画質は悪いけど隠れた神ゲーだとおもってる。
さいごに評価を１００点満点で評価します
グラフィック　５０　よくはないですが家もすべて入れます
マップ　８０　広いし建物全部入れるけど、ミッションの目標の家いがいアイテムあんまりないから入らない
やりこみ　７０　熱中してたまにまたやりたくなる
操作性　　６０昔のだから超なめらかではないけど動きやすい
アイテム、スキル　９０　種類は多い　
総合７５　総合てきにみたら７０－８０くらいです　星５でたとえるなら４ないくらいです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198035652268', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1697829133}
review:
The AI is atrocious, the game is honestly pretty ugly, it's crash and bug-happy, you do missions at night or get too many zombies in the scene (Looking at you final battle) and the game lags like no tomorrow. Does that make it bad? Hell no - you just need to know that going into this and know that no problem you face is getting fixed.

Fort Zombie is an all-round pretty decent game for it's price. It's one of the few games out there like it that I can think of that isn't Project Zomboid. Combining elements of RPG with squad-based gameplay, you build a fort and have two weeks to prepare for a horde of zombies coming from Indianapolis. You get missions to go out and look for survivors, weapons, or food/supplies. You can go into your fort and build and upgrade barricades and traps, place survivors, give them weapons, and get set up for when zombies come bashing your door down. Those are the elements that drew me to it, and still draw me into it. You can complete a full playthrough of the game in 4-5 hours, and I've played through it 4 times with this being my first one on Steam.

The glaring problems the game has though I outlined above. The AI of your survivors on raiding parties is terrible to the point I'd say don't bring them along if you're on a survivor mission - there is a decent chance they'll get stuck in a house and force you to leave them behind because they mess the scenery up to the point you physically can't get them out. They get stuck and lost on every fence you put in front of them, they have trouble navigating their way around rooms, and the pathfinding is god-awful. 

The game is from 2009 and it was showing it's age then too. The game crashes often, so save just as often. On the upside to this, the game autosaves every time you complete a mission so you never lose *too* much progress. The game also lags like no tomorrow when you do anything at night or with too many zombies - lagged when I bought it on my laptop 10 years ago with 4 GB of RAM and CPU-integrated graphics, lags now on my desktop with a GTX 970 and 16 GB of RAM.

But for $3.99? The game is well worth it. When it works, it's extremely fun for what it offers you and it doesn't offer anything it doesn't advertise. You have an OK RPG where you go to a base, clear it of zombies, find survivors, build a fort, and kill a horde of zombies. I fully recommend it at this price point, and if it goes on sale it only gets even more worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028869665', 'num_games_owned': 712, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 871, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1609777934}

author: {'steamid': '76561198250918426', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5089, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1686122010}
review:
うーん…なんか…
黎明期の洋ゲーのごときとっつきにくさ。難易度のせいなのかな。
極めて少ない説明（書）、チュートリアル。
物語性、ゼロ。
意図通りに動かないカメラワーク、操作。
メタルスライム殴ってるわけじゃないのにミスばかり起きる攻撃。コツは？
回復はどうやるの？死にかけなのにもいっかいスカベンジすか？
ガキ見つけたけどなぜか連れて帰れずに次に見たときは愛想つかされてましたけど？

スルメゲーになるかどうかの線に至るかどうかで評価が割れるかと。
その手前でイラついたらダメですね。
私はイラつきました。そして筆をとりました。
205円だったけどおすすめできません。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561197997310506', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1612873239}
review:
発売当初に他サイトで購入していましたが、STEAMで販売を
再開されていたので思わず購入。

当時このゲームを知った時は心が躍りました。まさにどんぴしゃ。
ゾンビ+サバイバル+アクション+ストラテジー。
来るゾンビとの最終決戦に向け街を探索し、生存者、武器、食料、医療品、防衛拠点の資材集め。
操作性の悪さと生存者AIのおバカさ、壁越しサーチに壁抜き発砲やら目立つ問題は色々あるけれど、全部ひっくるめて愛せるゲーム。

遊ぶ人を選ぶゲームだとは思うけど、私はこのゲームが大好きですっ!

review: This game is awesome ahah don't expect a 100% polished game with no bug or issue a gentleman from the community got me the game the community is uber nice too and they have a Romero mod to make zombies more like Romero zombies ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198049660460', 'num_games_owned': 497, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 1699, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1671169637}
review: This game meant everything to me when i was in middle school (Im 20 now). This was the first true zombie survival game and met my personal idea for the perfect zombie game and i lost many nights of sleep to this game. This version seems to crash alot but don't let that discourage you. Give it a try and im sure youll love it as much as i do. Was honestly surprised they added this to steam finally. Its been greenlit for years and the devs have been silent forever. But ive even been hearing rumors of a Fort Zombie 2. Im very curious why they went from abondoning this game to possibly making a sequel. But maybe the sequel is just a rumor. I've always felt the State of Decay games were the spiritual successors to fort zombie. You have to buy this game and give it a chance. Dont let my low game time confuse you. Ive been playing this game for damn near a decade. If youre like me this game is your zombie apocalypse wet dream.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032382434', 'num_games_owned': 2467, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 2970, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1218, 'last_played': 1631996923}
review:
Is it janky? Yes.
Is it buggy? Yes.
Will it crash often? DEFINITELY
Is it worth a buy? GOD DAMN RIGHT YOU ARE!

This is THE definitive Zombie Survival game in the world, the features alone on paper make it better than any others.
You NEED to take  the time out to learn the game, get used to the controls, the way hit markers work. It's ALL NUMBERS.
Real RPG Number Crunching.
So get a build you like. (I recommend playing as Police officer and giving more points to Clubs)
Take it slow
And most of all... STAY SAFE SURVIVORS.
This is Ben Riley in Fort Piety Indiana!

For those interested in this game, I have a Let's Play of the game.
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLncknXDr_WksLSibEdRspnAnBG7UeciRB

For people familiar with the game, this is how it runs on the final battle with a mid range-modern gaming pc.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1CUZ8FO84vI

author: {'steamid': '76561197978591049', 'num_games_owned': 308, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1647861322}
review:
This game is janky, broken, and buggy as hell. I love it.

I found my current community of degenerates from this game, way back when, watcxhing Revocanes lets play trying to work out how some of the traps work. They dont work, and they still dont work in this version

the game is outright broken. It runs, and is playable, but its buggy as hell and alot of the features dont work.
I honestly cannot recommend this game, but to me, it will always hold a special place in my heart.
